channel.title: Design Patterns on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Design Patterns on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Example when to use the Strategy Pattern
item.description:
Hello folks.

A quick post about an interesting idea.

I want to elaborate on a possibility to use the Strategy Design pattern.
